Source.Name: kdialog
Source.Summary: KDialog can be used to show nice dialog boxes from shell scripts
Source.Description: KDialog allows you to display dialog boxes from shell scripts. The syntax is very much inspired from the "dialog" command (which shows text mode dialogs).

Package.Name: kdialog
Package.Summary: KDialog can be used to show nice dialog boxes from shell scripts
Package.Description: KDialog allows you to display dialog boxes from shell scripts. The syntax is very much inspired from the "dialog" command (which shows text mode dialogs).
